captions.text:
[ Laughs ]
Rice, raw fish
and seaweed.

You won't accept
a guy's tongue in your mouth,
and you're gonna eat that?

l don't know.
Give it a ty.

Uh, it's your standard,
regular lunch, l guess.

Uh, that's applejuice.
l can read.
PB&I with the crusts cut om.

Well, Brian, this is
a vey nutritious lunch.

All the food groups
are represented.

Did your mom
mary Mr. Rogers?

title: The Breakfast Club (6/8) Movie CLIP - Lunchtime (1985) HD

comments.text:
Favorite moments: 
1. Bender slapping Brian's hand away.
2. Allison going all adorable mad scientist on her sandwich.
3. The fact Andrew brought half of the pantry with him for lunch.

This movie is timeless.﻿

comments.author: YummyTubbyToast

comments.text:
John Hughes seems like some kinda genius to me --- he managed to put every 
stereotype from American high school in the 80s in this movie and he 
fuckin' nailed all of them to a T --- I knew all these types of people 
because I grew up in a 80's high school.

I was kinda like Brian --- small, scrawney and brainy --- and my sister was 
like Claire --- prissy and even had the same haircut LOL.﻿
